title: Introduction to Programming
description: A beginner's course on programming fundamentals.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: What is Programming?
lessons.content: Programming is the process of creating a set of instructions that tell a computer how to perform a task...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Programming Languages
lessons.content: A programming language is a formal language comprising a set of instructions that produce various kinds of output...

options: A set of instructions for a computer
questions.correctAnswer: A set of instructions for a computer

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Variables are used to store data, and data types specify the type of data that can be stored...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Control Structures
lessons.content: Control structures are constructs that allow you to dictate the flow of execution of the code...

options: To control the flow of a program
questions.correctAnswer: To store data

title: Advanced Data Science
description: Dive deep into data analysis.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Data Cleaning
lessons.content: Data cleaning is the process of detecting and correcting (or removing) corrupt or inaccurate records from a record set, table, or database...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Exploratory Data Analysis
lessons.content: Exploratory data analysis (EDA) is an approach to analyzing data sets to summarize their main characteristics, often with visual methods...

options: A process of detecting and correcting corrupt or inaccurate data
A method to summarize data characteristics visually
A type of data analysis technique
questions.correctAnswer: A process of detecting and correcting corrupt or inaccurate data

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Supervised Learning
lessons.content: Supervised learning is the machine learning task of learning a function that maps an input to an output based on example input-output pairs...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Unsupervised Learning
lessons.content: Unsupervised learning is a type of machine learning algorithm used to draw inferences from datasets consisting of input data without labeled responses...

questions.correctAnswer: Learning from labeled data

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn essential skills for building modern websites.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: HTML Basics
lessons.content: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: CSS Styling
lessons.content: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML...

questions.correctAnswer: Hyper Text Markup Language

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Node.js
lessons.content: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a web browser...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Express Framework
lessons.content: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features to develop web and mobile applications...

questions.correctAnswer: A JavaScript runtime environment

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore the principles and techniques of AI.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to AI
lessons.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Machine Learning Basics
lessons.content: Machine learning is a subset of AI that allows systems to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed...

options: Simulation of human intelligence processes by machines
questions.correctAnswer: Simulation of human intelligence processes by machines

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Neural Networks
lessons.content: Neural networks are a set of algorithms, modeled loosely after the human brain, that are designed to recognize patterns...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Applications of Deep Learning
lessons.content: Deep learning is used in various fields such as computer vision, speech recognition, and natural language processing...

options: Algorithms modeled after the human brain
questions.correctAnswer: Algorithms modeled after the human brain

title: Mobile App Development
description: Learn to build mobile applications for iOS and Android.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Swift Programming Language
lessons.content: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language for macOS, iOS, watchOS, and tvOS...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Xcode IDE
lessons.content: Xcode is Apple's integrated development environment (IDE) for macOS used to develop software for macOS, iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, and tvOS...

options: A programming language for Apple platforms
questions.correctAnswer: A programming language for Apple platforms

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Kotlin Programming Language
lessons.content: Kotlin is a statically typed programming language that runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and also can be compiled to JavaScript source code...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Android Studio IDE
lessons.content: Android Studio is the official integrated development environment (IDE) for Google's Android operating system...

options: A programming language for Android development
questions.correctAnswer: A programming language for Android development

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity and protecting digital assets.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Types of Cyber Attacks
lessons.content: Common types of cyber attacks include phishing, malware, ransomware, and denial-of-service (DoS) attacks...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Cybersecurity Best Practices
lessons.content: Cybersecurity best practices involve measures taken to protect digital data from unauthorized access or attacks...

questions.text: What are common types of cyber attacks?
options: Software bugs, system errors, hardware failures
questions.correctAnswer: Phishing, malware, ransomware, denial-of-service (DoS)

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Firewall and VPN
lessons.content: A firewall is a network security device that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Encryption Techniques
lessons.content: Encryption is the process of converting data into a format that cannot be easily accessed by unauthorized users...

questions.correctAnswer: A network security device

title: Graphic Design Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Color Theory
lessons.content: Color theory is the collection of rules and guidelines that designers use to communicate with users through appealing color schemes...

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Typography

title: Project Management Fundamentals

questions.correctAnswer: Organizing and planning how to divide your time

lessons.content: Digital marketing encompasses all marketing efforts that use an electronic device or the internet...
